name: INVADERS ATTACK!
description:
A Space Shooter with a clear classic inspiration.

Varied single player game modes, a dedicated achievement system and local multiplayer on the same keyboard await for you.

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS OS:Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 64bitsCPU:Intel Core i3 3245 or AMD equivalentRAM:2 GBGPU:Intel HD Graphics 4000 or AMD equivalentFREE DISK SPACE: 400MB

This is my first published game and I want to give all the support I can, so it will be in active development, if you find any bug, please let me know!
